title: H2 storage - maximize amount of H2 in equilibrium

content.question: The amount of H2(g) present in a reaction mixture at equilibrium can be maximized by

choices.label: increasing the temperature and increasing the pressure by decreasing the volume
increasing the temperature and decreasing the pressure by increasing the volume
decreasing the temperature and increasing the pressure by decreasing the volume
decreasing the temperature and decreasing the pressure by increasing the volume

content.answer: increasing the temperature and decreasing the pressure by increasing the volume

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
